alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 7:33PM MDT until June 16 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Montana... Gallatin River near DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway affecting Gallatin County. Gallatin River at Logan affecting Gallatin County. For the Gallatin River...including DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway, Logan... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gallatin River at Logan. * WHEN...From Monday morning to Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.9 feet, Water into USGS gage house. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM MDT Sunday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 9.6 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.6 feet on 01/02/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Monday morning at 1015 AM MDT.
